t: Amazon.com: Mercer Culinary 7-Piece Forged Renaissance Knife Set,Black: Block Knife Sets: Home & Kitchen
s: I finally upgraded form my Chicago Cutlery. Stamped bladed and wooden handles. They were great knives but soft blades that couldn't hold an edge and needed regular steeling, handles needed maintenance as well. These Mercer have been an amazing upgrade. I couldn't get my head around the expense of German knives, too much $ for what you get. The Mercer are priced great. Quality is on par with the other German brands...
